channel.title: [Lightning Sword] My First Model
channel.description:
hey guys
i have made my first model
and i wanna see if it good for the first time
please use it :]
here pictures : [u][b]Weild [/b][/u] [URL=http://img825.imageshack.us/i/weild.png/][IMG]http://img825.imageshack.us/img825/5554/weild.png[/img][/URL]
[u][b]Drop[/b][/u] [URL=http://img526.imageshack.us/i/dropd.png/][IMG]http://img526.imageshack.us/img526/530/dropd.png[/img][/URL] [i][b] Download :[/b][/i] ~~~ MediaFire ~~~[URL=http://www.mediafire.com/?r9rij9f3ce95ci0]Lighning Sword.rar - 2 Kb[/URL] ~~~ MediaFire ~~~ ~~~ Uppit ~~~[URL=http://uppit.com/s550u5nhrdyf/Lighning_Sword.rar]Lighning Sword.rar - 2 Kb[/URL] ~~~ Uppit ~~~
Hope You Like It :)
And Please Comment :S

item.title: [Lightning Sword] My First Model
item.dc:creator: @CoonHunter CoonHunter
item.description:
@CoonHunter wrote:

[quote=“Lazyness, post:29, topic:375349”][quote author=reyx7 link=topic=471303.msg3448873#msg3448873 date=1293600205]
Alright, lets settle this once and for all. I think we can all agree this model looks like crap. I’m not denying that. But instead of telling him its shit, why dont u guys give him the advice so that we don’t see models like this again. All you guys try to do is drive the new guys out. Imagine if tribb wasn’t that good when he started, you guys might’ve driven him out. Look where he ended up in 8 months. As a harass Modeler
Why? Because people gave him constructive criticism. Why? Just because his models where better to look at? We should give EVERYONE CC so EVERYONE can improve.

To OP specifically, click the link in my signature for a tutorial that’s helped a decent amount of people. I’m hoping it can help you too.
[/quote]

This dude knows where it’s at. I would post a guide but the first and only decent guide that I’ve found on how to model was a guide on how to trace lolol. :P[/quote]

Read full topic

item.title: [Lightning Sword] My First Model
item.dc:creator: @Lazyness Lazyness
item.description:
@Lazyness wrote:

[quote=“Javafire, post:20, topic:375349”]“Oh look i moved and recolored a silverlight sword! hmm it looks like shit but i’ll rename it lightning YAY!”
it’s shiiiiiiiiittttttttttttttttttttttttttttttttttttttttttttttttttttttttttttttttttttttttttttttttttttttttt[/quote]

You are, by far, the biggest faggot to post on these forums. Ever. Go get banned.

And once again to EVERYONE ELSE… Seriously, be more constructive. Instead of saying “Jeeze you suck so much!” say something like “Maybe stick to solid shapes like primitives!” and if you want or can, post a link to a good starters tutorial…

item.title: [Lightning Sword] My First Model
item.dc:creator: @CoonHunter CoonHunter
item.description:
@CoonHunter wrote:

[quote=“the wanderer, post:16, topic:375349”]Seriously? You think saying that your hope just died and that he hates it is flaming? And people can change. Have you noticed that he hasn’t flamed a topic in a LONG time. And you can’t say that it isn’t shit. Some people just have bad people skills and say what they think. I can think of plenty of people in real life that say what they think without thinking if it will hurt someone’s feelings. Now please. If you don’t have anything nice to say, then don’t say anything.

Two wrongs don’t make a right.[/quote]

This ties in for H1 then, so stop defending him, as your being a hypocrite right there.

@Topic - Try something not so elaborate, and has some polygonal flow. This looks like you were messing with the create tool and clicking randomly. Look at CJ’s tutorial about tracing an image even. It will at least get you to doing something

Read full topic

item.title: [Lightning Sword] My First Model
item.dc:creator: @reyx7 reyx7
item.description:
@reyx7 wrote:

[quote=“the wanderer, post:14, topic:375349”][quote author=reyx7 link=topic=471303.msg3447296#msg3447296 date=1293511941]

Your hope just died, I hate it.

No one even cares what you think anyway.

Ontopic, I can see what angle you where going for, why not try to simple it up next time? also, don’t trace. Use primitives. Swap out the current handle with a cylinder or something.
[/quote]
Seriously? Get off his back. Two wrongs don’t make a right. Need to learn to grow up. Everyone is entitled their opinion on these forums.

@model I hate it also. Next time try keeping your polygon flow organized. And sorry to break this to you hun, but lightning doesn’t look like that.[/quote]

Dude, he gave no CC what so ever and posted a dick comment, and is regarded, and in my opinion the biggest, troll in this section by far. He’s an ass to all newcomers, and if you’re not some magic god at first, he gets all pissy and makes some dick comment. Seriously, lay off, it’s the guy’s first model.

EDIT:
http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,441075.0.html

Here is h1 skiller’s first model post here, stating he’s been modeling for awhile and here are some models and what not.
Notice the skill progression. He starts out with shitty flat models, and slowly gets better. We all have to start somewhere.

Read full topic

item.description:

[quote=“Lazyness, post:8, topic:375349”][quote author=krackkid link=topic=471303.msg3447126#msg3447126 date=1293504344]

Guys… Instead of just saying it’s bad, tell him what he can do to improve his work.
[/quote]By reading a tutorial.

Tutorials only go so far… You know what I learned from tutorials? I learned how to trace. Providing constructive criticism to someone who is new to something such as modelling is the best teaching that they can get.[/quote]Then he can google a tutorial?
